    level="1"

>
[Know the Beat](/Feats.aspx?ID=1156) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 81

**Archetype** [Zephyr Guard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=35)

**Prerequisites**
[Zephyr Guard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1154)

</column>

---

You become trained in your choice of Guild [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), Legal Lore, Mercantile Lore, or Underworld Lore. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) and to checks made to investigate crimes.
